question: Which paper proposes an alignment framework that steers language models to preferences of individual groups in a few-shot manner through augmenting the LLM with a transformer module?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Which paper proposes an alignment framework that steers language models to preferences of individual groups in a few-shot manner through augmenting the LLM with a transformer module?
eval_kwargs.reference_answer: GROUP PREFERENCE OPTIMIZATION: FEW-SHOT ALIGNMENT OF LARGE LANGUAGE MODELS
